title: Patch packed DLL by themida [closed]
content:
How to patch dll file packed by themida? I've dumped the unpacked file and patched it. But the program didn't recognize the unpacked dll. The original file and dumped file have ~8mb different size.

I tried to patch it while running inside debugger



Still no luck. Any idea how to patch it?

comments.text: Question is not really clear. I suggest you edit it and describe more details.

answers_data.content:
Many possibilities:

*P.S: you shall consider inline patching instead of unpacking the dll since your aim is to patch the dll.

comments.text: I can't patch the packed dll inside debugger. i.imgur.com/1OiY1Ci.png
Did you try using a hex editor instead ?
yes, it doesn't show the part where i want to patch. Because it's packed. I don't know how to re-map RVA to file Offset
probably i didn't unpack it properly.
